item.title: Commands
item.dc:creator: @XmoparscapeX XmoparscapeX
item.description:
@XmoparscapeX wrote:

sould it look like this or have i done it wrong

[code]f (command.startsWith(“notedbarrows”) && playerRights >= 2)
{
addItem(4717, 1000);
addItem(4719, 1000);
addItem(4721, 1000);
addItem(4723, 1000);
addItem(4709, 1000);
addItem(4711, 1000);
addItem(4713, 1000);
addItem(4715, 1000);
addItem(4754, 1000);
addItem(4756, 1000);
addItem(4758, 1000);
addItem(4760, 1000);
addItem(4746, 1000);
addItem(4748, 1000);
addItem(4750, 1000);
addItem(4752, 1000);
addItem(4733, 1000);
addItem(4735, 1000);
addItem(4737, 1000);
addItem(4739, 1000);
addItem(4727, 1000);
addItem(4729, 1000);
addItem(4731, 1000);
addItem(4725, 1000);
}
if (command.startsWith(“godstuff”) && playerRights >= 1) {
addItem(2412, 1);
addItem(2415, 1);
addItem(4037, 1);
addItem(3840, 1);
addItem(2414, 1);
addItem(2417, 1);
addItem(4039, 1);
addItem(3842, 1);
addItem(2413, 1);
addItem(2416, 1);
addItem(3844, 1);
}

if (command.startsWith(“pnpc”) && playerRights >= 3) {
try {
int newNPC = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(5));
if (newNPC <= 10000 && newNPC >= 0) {
npcId = newNPC;
isNpc = true;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
} else {
sendMessage(“No such P-NPC.”);
}
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(“Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pnpc #”);
}[/code][br][size=1]Posted on: March 16, 2007, 02:50:54 PM[/size][hr]?

Read full topic

item.title: Commands
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Adam Adam
item.description:
@Mod_Adam wrote:

if (command.startsWith("godstuff") && playerRights >= 1) { addItem(2412, 1); addItem(2415, 1); addItem(4037, 1); addItem(3840, 1); addItem(2414, 1); addItem(2417, 1); addItem(4039, 1); addItem(3842, 1); addItem(2413, 1); addItem(2416, 1); addItem(3844, 1); }

● Search "Barrows" in Client.Java. ● Add the Command above that

Congratulations

item.title: Commands
item.dc:creator: @Slivion Slivion
item.description:
@Slivion wrote:

Easy Peasy.

● Put a -}- at the bottom first.
● Search “Barrows” in Client.Java.
● Add the Command above that.
